Description: Body sherd of North Ionian pottery amphora or oinochoe (?); wild goat to right looking back, large dot rosette filling ornament; glazed area below.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 48 no. 4)
CVA Musée Scheurleer II (Hague) / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum Pays-Bas Musée Scheurleer (p. 1 II D, no. 7, pl. 2, no. 7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.033)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: T.2476 (Musée Scheurleer (The Hague) Registration number)
